sentence.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II is a high-risk neuroblastoma susceptibility gene, but how LMO1 cooperates with positive regulation of gene expression in neuroblastoma tumorigenesis is unclear.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: develop a novel zebrafish model that elucidates a mechanism by which positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II and positive regulation of gene expression synergistically initiate neuroblastoma and contribute to metastatic disease progression

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
